scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.test: cd client && npm test && cd ../server && npm test
scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../server && npx prisma generate
